LanguageData.NocturnalAnimals.BodyClock_Description: Determines when the animal sleeps and when it is awake.\n\nDiurnal animals sleep during the night and are awake during the day, while nocturnal animals sleep during the day and are awake during the night. Crepuscular animals are mainly active during dusk.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleaseIntoWildDesc: Release this animal to the wild and increase relations with tribal and outlander factions.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleaseToRepopulateDesc: Release this animal to the wild to repupulate and increase relations with tribal and outlander factions.
LanguageData.VAEE.LetterExtintAnimalsPasses:
A pair of {0}, critically endangered, have wandered into the area.

They can easily fall prey to larger predators and poachers, but you can tame them and bring them to safety. 

Releasing endangered animals into the wild will boost relations with tribal and outlander factions.
LanguageData.VAEE.LetterExtintAnimalsPassesRepopulate:
A pair of {0}, critically endangered, have wandered into the area.

They can easily fall prey to larger predators and poachers, but you can tame them and bring them to safety. 

Releasing endangered animals into the wild to repopulate the species will boost relations with tribal and outlander factions.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleasingToTheWildMessage: Releasing an endangered animal into the wild improved relations with tribal and outlander factions by +2.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleasingToTheWildMessageRepopulate: Releasing an endangered animal into the wild to repopulate the species improved relations with tribal and outlander factions by +2.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleasingToTheWildConfirmation: Releasing to the wild\n\nReleasing an animal to the wild means you will never see it again, as the animal will walk off the map.
LanguageData.VAEE.ReleasingToTheWildConfirmationRepop: Releasing to repopulate\n\nReleasing an animal to the wild to repopulate the species means you will never see it again, as the animal will walk off the map.
LanguageData.VAEE.AddBanishGizmoToAllAnimals: Add release into wild button to all animals
LanguageData.VAEE.AddBanishGizmoToAllAnimalsRepopulat: Add release to repopulate button to all animals
